feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: The academic profile of Prof. O-Joun Lee at The Catholic University of Korea

entry.title: Van Thuy Hoang won the Best Award in the 22nd Graduate School Academic Awards

link.title: Van Thuy Hoang won the Best Award in the 22nd Graduate School Academic Awards

entry.summary: Van Thuy Hoang, a doctoral student at the Network Science Lab @ CUK, received the Best Award (최우수상) at the 22nd Graduate School Academic Awards (제22회 대학원 학술상) Ceremony for his outstanding research in graph learning, highlighting the lab's leadership in graph ML.

entry.title: One NS-CUK paper presented at AAAI’25

link.title: One NS-CUK paper presented at AAAI’25

entry.summary: Members of the Network Science Lab at the Catholic University of Korea presented a paper on pre-training molecular graph neural networks at the 39th AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI 2025).

entry.title: Halal or Not, A Novel GNN Model for Predicting Cultural Appropriateness of Everyday Products

link.title: Halal or Not, A Novel GNN Model for Predicting Cultural Appropriateness of Everyday Products

entry.summary: The Network Science Lab at the Catholic University of Korea releases Halal or Not (HaCKG), a novel attributed knowledge graph completion model for predicting cultural appropriateness of everyday products (mainly, halal and haram of cosmetics).

entry.title: S-CGIB, A Novel Pre-trained Graph Neural Network Model in Molecular Structure Learning

link.title: S-CGIB, A Novel Pre-trained Graph Neural Network Model in Molecular Structure Learning

entry.summary: The Network Science Lab at the Catholic University of Korea releases S-CGIB, a novel pre-trained graph neural network model for molecular structure learning.

entry.title: One NS-CUK paper accepted for AAAI’25

link.title: One NS-CUK paper accepted for AAAI’25

entry.summary: Members of the Network Science Lab at the Catholic University of Korea submitted one paper on pre-training graph neural networks on molecules to the 39th AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI 2025) and was accepted.

entry.title: Jin Woo Jeong and Ju Hee Shim won the Best Award in the 2024 CUK Competition on AI, CSIE, and DS

link.title: Jin Woo Jeong and Ju Hee Shim won the Best Award in the 2024 CUK Competition on AI, CSIE, and DS

entry.summary: The undergraduate research assistants of the Network Science Lab at the Catholic University of Korea distinguished themselves in the 2024 CUK Competition on AI, CSIE, and DS (제 3회 가톨릭대학교 인공지능학과/컴퓨터정보공학부/데이터사이언스학과 경진대회), securing the Best Award.

entry.title: 2024 Fall CUK AI Seminar Series
entry.summary: The Department of Artificial Intelligence at the Catholic University of Korea is hosting a series of seminars on various areas of application of artificial intelligence. Spanning 13 weeks, from September 3rd, 2024, to November 26th, 2024, this series will feature 12 talks by leading experts.

entry.title: Jin Woo Jeong won the Encouragement Award in the 2024 CUK Competition on Industrial Mathematics

link.title: Jin Woo Jeong won the Encouragement Award in the 2024 CUK Competition on Industrial Mathematics

entry.summary: The undergraduate research assistant of the Network Science Lab at the Catholic University of Korea distinguished himself in the 2024 CUK Competition on Industrial Mathematics (제1회 가톨릭대학교 수학과 산업수학 경진대회), securing the Encouragement Award.

entry.title: NS-CUK Summer School on Digital Humanities 2024

link.title: NS-CUK Summer School on Digital Humanities 2024

entry.summary: The Network Science Lab at the Catholic University of Korea organizes a summer school dedicated to digital humanities. This program consists of 11 lectures presented by Dr. Eun-Soon You (유은순 박사), from July 17th, 2024, to July 31st, 2024.

entry.title: Jin Woo Jeong, Min Seo Kim, and Jinho Seo won the Encouragement Award in the 2024 CUK Competition on Data Analytics

link.title: Jin Woo Jeong, Min Seo Kim, and Jinho Seo won the Encouragement Award in the 2024 CUK Competition on Data Analytics

entry.summary: The undergraduate research assistants of the Network Science Lab at the Catholic University of Korea have once again distinguished themselves in the 2024 CUK Competition on Data Analytics (제4회 가톨릭대학교 데이터분석 경진대회), securing the encouragement award for the third consecutive year.
